languages.text: "Завистливые конкуренты!" {n}Джай разводит руками.{/n} "Особенно Фалько. Уверена, кража груза — его рук дело. Но от этого ашмага хоть понятно, чего ожидать. А вот имперская власть в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе{/g} пусть и раздроблена на осколки, в любой момент готова нагнать и покарать человека моего... промысла".

traits.locale_text: "Завистливые конкуренты!" {n}Джай разводит руками.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g} их побери, постоянно суют палки в колеса! Особенно Фалько — уверена, кража груза его рук дело. Но от этого ашмага хоть понятно, чего ожидать. А вот имперская власть в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Коронусе{/g} пусть и раздроблена на осколки, в любой момент готова нагнать и покарать человека моего... промысла".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."
languages.original_text: "Завистливые конкуренты!" {n}Джай разводит руками.{/n} "Особенно Фалько. Уверена, кража груза — его рук дело. Но от этого ашмага хоть понятно, чего ожидать. А вот имперская власть в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе{/g} пусть и раздроблена на осколки, в любой момент готова нагнать и покарать человека моего... промысла".

traits.locale_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我有很多对手，他们嫉妒我的成功！”{n}婕伊举起了双手。{/n}“尤其是法尔科，我很确信那批货物就是他偷的，但我永远想象不到那个坏种接下来会怎么做。尽管帝国的权威在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}中支离破碎，但它随时都有可能会打击……干我们这一行的人。”
languages.original_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: “我有很多对手，他们嫉妒我的成功！”{n}婕伊举起了双手。{/n}“尤其是法尔科，我很确信那批货物就是他偷的，但我永远想象不到那个坏家伙接下来会怎么做。尽管帝国的权威在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}中支离破碎，但它随时都有可能会打击……干我们这一行的人。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Rivales envidiosos de mi éxito!». {n}Jae alza las manos.{/n} «Especialmente Falco. Estoy segura de que el robo del cargamento fue cosa suya, pero nunca consigo predecir cuál será la próxima de ese ashmag. Y, aunque la autoridad del Imperium está fragmentada en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}, aún podría tomar medidas contra la gente de mi... profesión en cualquier momento».
languages.original_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: «¡Rivales envidiosos de mi éxito!». {n}Jae alza las manos.{/n} «Especialmente Falco. Estoy segura de que el robo del cargamento fue cosa suya, pero nunca consigo predecir cuál será la próxima de ese ashmag. Y, aunque la autoridad del Imperium está fragmentada en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}, aún podría tomar medidas contra la gente de mi... profesión en cualquier momento».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ライバルの仕業さ、俺の成功に嫉妬してる奴らがいるんだ！」{n}ジェイは降参と言わんばかりに両手を上げる。{/n}「特に厄介なのがファルコね。積み荷泥棒は絶対アイツの仕業だ。でも、あのアッシュマグが次に何をするか全く予想がつかない。帝国当局は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}では分断されてるかもしれないけど、あたしの仲間…仕事仲間はいつ取り締まられてもおかしくない」
languages.original_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: 「ライバルの仕業さ、俺の成功に嫉妬してる奴らがいるんだ！」{n}ジェイは降参と言わんばかりに両手を上げる。{/n}「特に厄介なのがファルコね。積み荷泥棒は絶対アイツの仕業だ。でも、あのアッシュマグが次に何をするか全く予想がつかない。帝国当局は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}では分断されてるかもしれないけど、あたしの仲間…仕事仲間はいつ取り締まられてもおかしくない」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « La faute à tous ces rivaux qui envient mon succès ! {n}s'exclame-t-elle en levant les mains au ciel.{/n} À commencer par Falco. Je parie que c'est lui qui a orchestré le vol de la cargaison. Que voulez-vous, cet ashmag est totalement imprévisible. Et si les autorités impériales sont dispersées à travers les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}, elles pourraient à tout instant décider de sévir contre les individus de ma... profession. »
languages.original_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: « La faute à tous ces rivaux qui envient mon succès ! {n}s'exclame-t-elle en levant les mains au ciel.{/n} À commencer par Falco. Je parie que c'est lui qui a orchestré le vol de la cargaison. Que voulez-vous, cet ashmag est totalement imprévisible. Et si les autorités impériales sont dispersées à travers les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}, elles pourraient à tout instant décider de sévir contre les individus de ma... profession. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Rivalen, die neidisch auf meinen Erfolg sind!" {n}Jae wirft die Hände in die Luft.{/n} "Vor allem Falco. Ich bin sicher, er steckt hinter dem Frachtdiebstahl. Aber ich weiß nie, was dieser Ashmag als Nächstes vorhat. Und auch wenn die Autorität des Imperiums in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} fragmentiert ist, kann sie bei Leuten meines ... Berufsstands jederzeit zuschlagen."
languages.original_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: "Rivalen, die neidisch auf meinen Erfolg sind!" {n}Jae wirft die Hände in die Luft.{/n} "Vor allem Falco. Ich bin sicher, er steckt hinter dem Frachtdiebstahl. Aber ich weiß nie, was dieser Ashmag als Nächstes vorhat. Und auch wenn die Autorität des Imperiums in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} fragmentiert ist, kann sie bei Leuten meines ... Berufsstands jederzeit zuschlagen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Başarımı gören rakiplerim kıskançlıktan çatlıyor!" {n}Jae, ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Özellikle de Falco. Kargonun çalınmasından o sorumluydu, buna kalıbımı basarım. Külboğaz herifin bir sonraki hamlesini asla tahmin edemiyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'te{/g} İmparatorluk'un otoritesi paramparça olsa da her an benim... Mesleğimdeki insanlara karşı sert önlemler alınabilir."
languages.original_text: "Rivals, envious of my success!" {n}Jae throws up her hands.{/n} "Falco especially. I am certain the theft of the cargo was his doing. But I can never predict what that ashmag will do next. And while the Imperium's authority may be fragmented in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, it could crack down on people of my... profession at any moment."

traits.locale_text: "Başarımı gören rakiplerim kıskançlıktan çatlıyor!" {n}Jae, ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Özellikle de Falco. Kargonun çalınmasından o sorumluydu, buna kalıbımı basarım. O külboğazın bir sonraki hamlesini asla tahmin edemiyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'te İmparatorluk'un otoritesi paramparça olsa da, her an benim... Mesleğimdeki insanlara karşı sert önlemler alınabilir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
